channel.title: Posts on Eirik's Tech Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Eirik's Tech Blog

item.title: Setup a server with zfs and docker
item.author: habbis@medmail.ch (Eirik Habbestad Helleve)
item.description: Setup a server with zfs and docker You are free to use this as you wish I am also using this as my own wiki to remember how to do stuff. I hope this can help other people. I am going to set up a Digitalocean vps with docker and testing out zfs as docker storage driver. I am going to use Ubuntu 16.04 since it have a native zfs binary.

item.title: Lxd
item.author: habbis@medmail.ch (Eirik Habbestad Helleve)
item.description: LXD setup I am now trying out LXC and LXD both are cool technologies. Lxd it is aÂ· hyper-visor for lxc containers(linux containers). So why LXD/LXC? That is a good question and it can have many answers. It has benefits like being closer to the metal. And it behaves more like a virtual machine and for me it is easier understand concept behind it. Lxd is also more like Freebsd jails and the solaris zones.
